text:
the total acceleration data have a blue, orange, and green histogram respectively. In the ﬁrst
ﬁgure, can see that each activity has a diﬀerent data distribution, with a marked diﬀerence
between the large movement (ﬁrst three activities) with the stationary activities (last three
activities). Data distributions for the ﬁrst three activities look Gaussian with perhaps diﬀering
means and standard deviations. Distributions for the latter activities look multi-modal (i.e.
multiple peaks).
